name: Shaman (kraksnax)
overview: Classic shoot-em-up action for the COMMODORE 64 with some unseen elements or features included that only those who possess the shaman's eye shall discover. An Arcade Shoot em up in which you must destroy waves of enemies for a high score. Game is a ROM hack of The 1982 Galaga game by Henrik Wening originally published in Courbois Software #6414 with just modifications to colors, title and addition of some really nice boot screens and intro graphics.
